Articles.Content:
I noticed that on the KSP website someone stated that the kerbalizer is about to be discontinued. I tried downloading it a couple of weeks ago, and paypal forced me to pay $1 and then sent me a confirmation email. Not only did I not get the email, but I didn't even gain download rights to the kerbalizer. What is the current status of the kerbalizer? Is it still usable? What is the future of the kerbalizer?

It's a shame to see that the kerbalizer is being discontinued, since I meant to download it to put a customized kerbal in my avatar box, but other things kept me busy until recently...

Agree!111One1!!!!!won!!!one!!!!

seriously though, Kerbalizer is a very nice little bit of KSP, sad to see it like this.
*Determination

The Kerbalizer is dead until Unity Technologies fix their web player, the price on the Squad store is $0 and there is a warning right there on the page.

Quote

Due to the tools used to visualize Kerbalizer being discontinued we will no longer be selling the app in our website.

Please contact Paypal for a refund for the Paypal administration fee.
